mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cinema(ccode, cname, cnameEn, cintro, cprdtYear, cshowTime, copenDate, cprdtStatNm, ctypeNm, cnationNm, cgenreNm, cdirectorNm, cdirectorNmEn, cactorNm, cactorNmEn, ccompanyNm, ccompanyNmEn, cwatchGradeNm, crank) VALUES (#{movieCd}, #{movieNm}, #{movieNmEn}, "영화소개", #{prdtYear}, #{showTm}, #{openDt}, #{prdtStatNm}, #{typeNm}, #{nationNm}, #{genreNm}, #{peopleNm}, #{peopleNmEn}, #{peopleNm}, #{peopleNmEn}, #{companyNm}, #{companyNmEn}, #{watchGradeNm}, #{rank});
